2. The fourth gate applies the transformation $U_4 = e^{i\theta_4 a_1 a_2}$. 

Assuming that the system starts in the state $|0\rangle |0\rangle |0\rangle |0\rangle$, where $|0\rangle$ is the vacuum state, what is the probability of measuring the state $|1\rangle|1\rangle|1\rangle|1\rangle$ after the final measurement?
